short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 123Greetings.com is the world's leading website for free ecards relating to human emotions, world events, holidays and occasions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
123Greetings.com is the world's leading website for human expressions, allowing users to beautifully express emotions on world events, holidays and occasions.
Over 95 million visitors use 123Greetings.com annually to send free ecards and greetings worldwide. Its offering of over 42,000 ecards across multiple languages covers a mix of 3,000 seasonal & everyday categories.  
Send greetings as postcards or animated cards with personal messages around the world for FREE!!
Features
Cards for Every Occasion, Every Event and Every Holiday
Use Connect feature to import unlimited Personal and Professional Contacts from your Address book to send ecards
Get timely Birthday Reminders of all your contacts
Schedule Delivery in Advance
Tracking feature which provides reports on Delivered and Viewed status of ecards
24/7 Customer Support
Mobile Website that includes all the above features
